Description.Text: Residence Inn by Marriott Munich City East, an excellent choice for guests looking for business-friendly aparthotels in Au-Haidhausen near a health spa.

The 125 air-conditioned guestrooms at Residence Inn by Marriott Munich City East include laptop-compatible safes and safes. Guests can use the in-room complimentary wireless and wired high-speed Internet access. 32-inch flat-screen TVs are equipped with satellite channels and pay movies. All accommodations provide desks and speakerphones. Bathrooms offer bathtubs or showers with handheld showerheads, makeup/shaving mirrors, hair dryers, and complimentary toiletries. All units have kitchens with stovetops, microwaves, refrigerators, and dishwashers. Additional amenities include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards. In addition, amenities available on request include hypo-allergenic bedding, bathrobes, and wake-up calls. Housekeeping is offered daily
This hotel is located in Munich (Au-Haidhausen), close to Prinzregententheater, Marienplatz, and Bavarian National Museum. Also nearby are Deutsches Museum and Hofbrauhaus
The Residence Inn by Marriott Munich City East is easily accessible by car and public transportation.
